top_stories.title: Meridian raises $17 million to remake the agentic spreadsheet
top_stories.description: A new company called Meridian.AI has emerged from stealth with an IDE-based approach to agentic financial modeling.
top_stories.author: Russell Brandom
top_stories.content: A new company called Meridian.AI has emerged from stealth with an IDE-based approach to agentic financial modeling.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B MoE model is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
top_stories.description: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
top_stories.author: Dan Ferguson
top_stories.content: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.

top_stories.title: How to Implement Responsible AI Frameworks for Ethical and Transparent AI
top_stories.description: Implement Responsible AI frameworks to ensure ethical, transparent AI while meeting global regulations and building enterprise trust. The uptake of AI has been rampant in all industries, such as the financial services industry, the healthcare industry, and the manufacturing industry, and regulators have been responsive. The changes in the EU... The post How to Implement Responsible AI Frameworks for Ethical and Transparent AI first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Google AI Introduces Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI): An Agentic Multimodal Accessibility Framework Built on Gemini for Adaptive UI Design
top_stories.description: Google Research is proposing a new way to build accessible software with Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI), an agentic framework where a multimodal AI agent becomes the primary user interface and adapts the application in real time to each user’s abilities and context. Instead of shipping a fixed UI and adding accessibility as a separate layer, […] The post Google AI Introduces Natively Adaptive Interfaces (NAI): An Agentic Multimodal Accessibility Framework Built on Gemini for Adaptive UI...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
